nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会
en: 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十四次全国代表大会于1992年10月18日选举产生的中央委员会，任期至1997年9月。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 14th National Congress of the Communist Party of China on October 18, 1992, serving until September 1997.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四次全国代表大会
en: 14th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 选举产生中国共产党第十四届中央委员会的全国代表大会。
description.en: The National Congress that elected the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央总书记，是中共第三代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: Chinese politician, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, and the core of the third generation of CPC central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，时任中共中央军委副主席。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, then Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, then a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and a secretary of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, then head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任国务委员兼国家经济体制改革委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, then State Councilor and Minister in charge of the State Commission for Restructuring Economy.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第十四届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, member of the 14th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共第十四届中央委员会期间，先后任上海市委书记、中央书记处书记、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served successively as Shanghai Party Secretary, Secretary of the Central Secretariat, and Vice Premier during the term of the 14th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记，后因腐败问题被审查撤职。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Beijing, who was later investigated and removed from office for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共第十四届中央委员会期间，先后任山东省委书记、中央书记处书记、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served successively as Shandong Party Secretary, Secretary of the Central Secretariat, and Vice Premier during the term of the 14th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交家，时任中华人民共和国国务院副总理兼外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, then Vice Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共第十四届中央委员会期间，任上海市市长、市委书记，并于1994年增选为中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Mayor and Party Secretary of Shanghai during the term of the 14th CPC Central Committee, and was co-opted as a Politburo member in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央纪委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Party Secretary of Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共天津市委书记，于1993年任内逝世。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Party Secretary of Tianjin, who died in office in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央政治局候补委员、中央书记处书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, then an alternate member of the Politburo and a secretary of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央政治局候补委员、全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, then an alternate member of the Politburo and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: Chinese politician, the core of the second generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黎族，在中共十四届二中全会上由候补中央委员递补为中央委员。
description.en: Chinese politician of Li ethnicity, who was promoted from alternate member to full member of the Central Committee at the Second Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共十四届五中全会上由候补中央委员递补为中央委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, who was promoted from alternate member to full member of the Central Committee at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回族，在中共十四届五中全会上由候补中央委员递补为中央委员。
description.en: Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity, who was promoted from alternate member to full member of the Central Committee at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在中共十四届五中全会上增补为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who was appointed Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在中共十四届五中全会上增补为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who was appointed Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在中共十四届五中全会上增补为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who was appointed a member of the Central Military Commission at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在中共十四届五中全会上增补为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who was appointed a member of the Central Military Commission at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共十四届六中全会上由候补中央委员递补为中央委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, who was promoted from alternate member to full member of the Central Committee at the Sixth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共十四届七中全会上由候补中央委员递补为中央委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, who was promoted from alternate member to full member of the Central Committee at the Seventh Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The top leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央委员会全体会议选举产生的中国共产党中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China, elected by the Central Committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee that oversees ideology-related work.

nodes.id: 国家经济体制改革委员会

zh-cn: 国家经济体制改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门，负责全国经济体制改革。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national economic system reform.

en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China
Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China
Shandong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China
Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China
Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal-control institution of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: First Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 选举产生新一届中央领导机构。
description.en: Elected the new central leadership.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第二次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第二次全体会议
en: Second Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《关于调整「八五」计划若干指标的建议》、《关于党政机构改革的方案》，并递补王学萍为中央委员。
description.en: Reviewed and passed the 'Proposal on Adjusting Certain Targets of the Eighth Five-Year Plan' and the 'Plan for the Reform of Party and Government Institutions', and promoted Wang Xueping to full member of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 通过《中共中央关于建立社会主义市场经济体制若干问题的决定》。
description.en: Passed the 'Decision of the CPC Central Committee on Some Issues Concerning the Establishment of a Socialist Market Economic System'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第四次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第四次全体会议
en: Fourth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 通过关于加强党的建设的决定，增选黄菊为中央政治局委员，增补吴邦国、姜春云为中央书记处书记。
description.en: Passed a decision on strengthening party building, co-opted Huang Ju as a Politburo member, and appointed Wu Bangguo and Jiang Chunyun as secretaries of the Central Secretariat.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议
en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 通过“九五”计划和2010年远景目标建议，决定撤销陈希同职务，并增补军委成员。
description.en: Passed proposals for the 'Ninth Five-Year Plan' and 2010 long-range objectives, decided to remove Chen Xitong from his posts, and appointed new members to the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第六次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第六次全体会议
en: Sixth Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 通过关于加强社会主义精神文明建设的决议，决定于1997年下半年召开中共十五大。
description.en: Passed a resolution on strengthening socialist spiritual civilization, and decided to convene the 15th Party Congress in the second half of 1997.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第七次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第七次全体会议
en: Seventh Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 为中共十五大做准备，正式开除陈希同党籍。
description.en: Prepared for the 15th Party Congress and formally expelled Chen Xitong from the Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都。
description.en: Capital of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四次全国代表大会选举产生了第十四届中央委员会。
description.en: The 14th National Congress of the CPC elected the 14th Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共十四届四中全会通过的《决定》指出，党的建设这项“新的伟大的工程”是由以邓小平为核心的第二代中央领导集体开创的。
description.en: The 'Decision' passed by the 4th Plenum of the 14th Central Committee pointed out that the 'new great engineering' of party building was initiated by the second-generation central leadership collective with Deng Xiaoping at its core.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会
中华人民共和国国务院
全国人民代表大会常务委员会
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
中华人民共和国国务院
国家经济体制改革委员会
中华人民共和国国务院

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第二次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在二中全会上，中央候补委员王学萍被递补为中央委员。
description.en: At the Second Plenary Session, alternate Central Committee member Wang Xueping was promoted to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在四中全会上，黄菊被增选为中央政治局委员。
description.en: At the Fourth Plenary Session, Huang Ju was co-opted as a member of the Politburo.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在四中全会上，吴邦国被增补为中央书记处书记。
description.en: At the Fourth Plenary Session, Wu Bangguo was appointed as a secretary of the Central Secretariat.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在四中全会上，姜春云被增补为中央书记处书记。
description.en: At the Fourth Plenary Session, Jiang Chunyun was appointed as a secretary of the Central Secretariat.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 五中全会审议并通过了中央纪律检查委员会关于陈希同问题的审查报告，决定撤销其的中共中央政治局委员、中央委员职务。
description.en: The Fifth Plenary Session reviewed and passed the report from the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection on the Chen Xitong issue, deciding to remove him from his positions as a member of the Politburo and the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在五中全会上，中央候补委员耿全礼被递补为中央委员。
description.en: At the Fifth Plenary Session, alternate Central Committee member Geng Quanli was promoted to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在五中全会上，中央候补委员马启智被递补为中央委员。
description.en: At the Fifth Plenary Session, alternate Central Committee member Ma Qizhi was promoted to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在五中全会上，张万年被增补为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: At the Fifth Plenary Session, Zhang Wannian was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在五中全会上，迟浩田被增补为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: At the Fifth Plenary Session, Chi Haotian was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在五中全会上，王克被增补为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: At the Fifth Plenary Session, Wang Ke was appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在五中全会上，王瑞林被增补为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: At the Fifth Plenary Session, Wang Ruilin was appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第六次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在六中全会上，中央候补委员孙文盛被递补为中央委员。
description.en: At the Sixth Plenary Session, alternate Central Committee member Sun Wensheng was promoted to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第七次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在七中全会上，中央候补委员克尤木·巴吾东被递补为中央委员。
description.en: At the Seventh Plenary Session, alternate Central Committee member Keyum Bawudun was promoted to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会第七次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 七中全会审议通过了中央纪律检查委员会关于陈希同问题的审查报告，正式开除其党籍，移交司法机关审判。
description.en: The Seventh Plenary Session reviewed and passed the report from the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection on the Chen Xitong issue, formally expelling him from the Party and handing him over to judicial authorities for trial.
